alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Schuyler; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Steuben; Tioga; Tompkins; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 27 at 2:44PM EST until February 28 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Yates, Seneca, Southern Cayuga, Steuben, Schuyler, Chemung and Tompkins counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 1 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery, snow-covered road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute today and the Tuesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will move in this afternoon and quickly produce heavy snowfall rates up to 1.5 inches per hour into the evening. The combination of snow and some sleet or freezing drizzle mixing in and gusty winds with blowing snow will create hazardous travel conditions with slippery roads possible. The snow will be wet with a high water content... making shoveling very difficult. The snow will taper off Tuesday morning before ending in the afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Chemung; Schuyler; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Steuben; Tioga; Tompkins; Yates
